name: Aria di Bravura (NSFW)
description:
Dragon Dares: Aria di Bravura is the first "visual short story" from the world of Dragon Dares! This series is a prequel to the main game, granting new insights and sneak peeks into the lovable cast of characters that make up the sweet little town of Rabbit Rock.

Ariel DeLong has never once knocked on the door to Aria Torres' room. They've been best friends since they were children, so there's never been any need... Little does Ariel know, Aria prefers to do her video game streams sans pants...

Features include:

  • An all-new original story from the world of Dragon Dares!
  • A completely original soundtrack!
  • Steamy art of Aria and Ariel, complete with animations!

You can support development by contributing to our Patreon or SubscribeStar!
